title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
e Overgrown Tunnel. Go through the tunnel to speak with Auntie Ethel. This will give you the following dialogue options.

Tell me where Mayrina is. Or what? I think I'll stay a while. Forgive me. I'll leave right away.

Choosing dialogue 2 will have Auntie Ethel tease you about finding out whats under her house. Explore the tunnels and find the gnarled door (X:-305 Y:587) and a table with some masks on it. Pick up the whispering mask. Interact with the door to have the following dialogue options
